post:
Webhosting UK Com Ltd. (WHUK), a web hosting company in the UK since 2001, offering professional grade quality VPS hosting services over Dell hardware hosted in Tier IV datacenter facility at a 50% discounted price this X’mas season.


Use discount code ‘XMASLVPS50’ to avail discount.

NOTE: Use the code at check-out in the promotions box, to apply the discount.

Here’s a list of professional VPS plans to choose from:

xLite Starter @ £10.50 GBP
• 1 vCPU Core
• 60 GB Disk Space - SAS
• 2 GB RAM
• Unrestricted Monthly Bandwidth
• CentOS 6.2 / Ubuntu Operating System
• Softaculous
• Full Root SSH Access
• 2 Dedicated IP’s
• Free 24x7 Premium Support, Fully Managed
• 99.95% Uptime Guarantee
​
Discounted Price : £10.50 GBP
Monthly Price : £21.00 GBP
